name: Kimberly Brooks
detail: Born and raised in Southern California, Kimberly Brooks is an industry proven voiceover dynamo, gaining recognition for her performances on many respected animated shows and interactive video games. In addition to having one of the more sought after commercial voices, Kimberly is also known for her extensive on-air promo work with networks such as NBC, FOX, SoapNet.

voices.name: Jasper
voices.subjectNameCn: 史蒂文的宇宙 第一季
